nodes.text: Originally posted by DarKnight 'in for a penny, in for a pound' mentality would mean gun rampages would be worse because instead of using their .38 'weekend fun' pistols they'll switch to automatic assault weapons (which, imported illegally from the middle east/asia, kalashnikov rifles are CHEAPER then domestic US pistols).

Oh! Did you mean something like this in gun free France: http://www.guardian.co.uk/international/story/0,3604,912880,00.html?79%3A+International+news+-+guardian Those weapons were cheap and from an eastern block country. Machine guns are for sissy American felons. Real felons in gun free France use anti-tank weapons.
